Tool Name: GONE IN 59 SECONDS - HIGH SPEED BACKDOOR INJECTION VIA BOOTABLE USB - ARSENAL THEATER DEMO
Description: Gaining physical access was trivial, but now the computer is locked (or off) and time is running outâ€¦the "SmuggleBus" allows us to take advantage of unencrypted drives to quickly collect local password hashes and implant the backdoor of our choice without modifying any system binaries - all from a bootable USB and in a matter of seconds.
